Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. May I come in?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Gardening Tour</RED>. Everyone's
already gathered so let's head on over
to the event stage!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The previous one ended in a very
unfortunate way. This time, 
<BLUE><MOJI0> people</BLUE> have come to watch.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The previous one ended in an unfortunate
way. This time, <BLUE><MOJI0> people</BLUE> have come
to watch.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The previous one ended well. This time,
<BLUE><MOJI0> people</BLUE> have come to watch.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The previous one was a lot of fun for
everyone. This time, <BLUE><MOJI0> people</BLUE> 
have come to watch.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone liked the previous one! This
time, <BLUE><MOJI0> people</BLUE> have come to watch.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The previous one was outstanding! This
time, <BLUE><MOJI0> people</BLUE> have come to watch.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's our very first one! We have
<BLUE><MOJI0> people</BLUE> here to watch.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now let's go view some gardening! Take
it away, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think it's about time to call it a 
day. To all the participants, thank you
very much for coming out today.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, don't tell me... Did you forget
about today's tour? How could you?!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We have no choice but to cancel it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, everyone. I know you came all
the way out here, but you might as well
go home.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, you disappoint me. Not only
that, you disappointed the participants.
Make sure this never happens again.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Here's the money you've
earned. I hope you'll use it for your
future gardening endeavors!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have high hopes for the next tour. 
Good luck! Well now, I think we'll
excuse ourselves.

Let's take a look at the collections
you received. How much did you earn?

You didn't receive any money this time.
Next time make sure to have a proper
garden ready!

You received <BLUE><MOJI0> G</BLUE> this time.
I guess the tour was a failure. Better
luck next time.

You received <BLUE><MOJI0> G</BLUE> this time!
The tour was a moderate success. Give it
your all next time.

You received <BLUE><MOJI0> G</BLUE> this time!
The tour was a moderate success. Give it
your all next time.

You received <BLUE><MOJI0> G</BLUE> this time!
Everyone had fun on the tour. Give it
your all next time.

You received <BLUE><MOJI0> G</BLUE> this time!
The tour was a great success! Good job!
Let's make the next one just as good!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0> wants to buy your garden
display. Would you consider selling it?
Sell
Don't sell

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's a deal! Here's the asking price of
<BLUE><MOJI0> G</BLUE>. I'm sure <CHARANAME0> 
will be thrilled!

Received <BLUE><MOJI0> G</BLUE>!
Hooray! Aren't you glad you put
so much work into your garden?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take the garden to <CHARANAME0>.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I understand. You poured your heart into
it, so I'm not surprised you don't want
to let it go. I'll tell <CHARANAME0>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be going now. See you later, 
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, it's a Western-style garden this
time. It's got a nice atmosphere to it.
I really like gardens like this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Me, too! I wish I had a garden like
this. I want <MYNAME> to make me one.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
This one is amazing! It's really very
lovely. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I agree. For something that <MYNAME>
made, I think it's very well done.
I'll be sure to give some compliments.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wouldn't say it's the best I've ever
seen, but it is a very nice garden. 
Not bad. Not bad at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME> is amazing. To think
that they can make something
like this just amazes me.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nice! I really like this garden. <MYNAME>
did a really good job.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>It's not bad, but it needs just a bit
more to really shine. I'll be expecting
big things next time.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now this is quite a garden. I'm sure
a lot of hard work goes into making a
garden like this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>You think so? I could make something
like this easily.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Man, what's the deal with this garden? 
There's nothing interesting about it. I
shouldn't have even come here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>Hmm... I have to agree, Allen. And I was
looking forward to it, too...

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I really love the tropical theme this
garden evokes. It's been coordinated
wonderfully.
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>You're right. It's beautiful. I could
gaze at it for hours. I have to remember
to get a picture of it later.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a wonderful garden. I would say
it is on the same level as one you'd
find back at the palace.
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Yes. This garden is so lovely. It would
go perfect with some tea and sweets.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a wonderful garden. A garden like
this could be a famous attraction for
the town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I agree. I must say, <MYNAME> is really
quit talented. I'm certainly impressed.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice garden. I want to spend
some more time observing it. It's too
bad there's a time limit.
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME> would be happy to hear that. I
sure hope their future gardens are just
as lovely.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not terribly impressive, but not bad by
any means. I suppose it's decent. At the
very least, it has a good balance.
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>It does have balance, but something is
missing... I think their next garden
will be better.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
To be honest, I'm disappointed. I had
expected a much better garden.
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yes. This garden should never have seen
the light of day in its current state.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is the theme of this garden the
waterfront? I think it's wonderful.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I love the atmosphere. I want a picture
to be taken so I can hang it in my room.
Maybe I should go ask Dunhill.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Take a look, Klaus. This garden is
wonderful. I could gaze at it forever.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>This garden is nothing short of
breathtaking. Simply spectacular. My hat
comes off to you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good work, <MYNAME>. You've made a great
garden. I am enthralled by its beauty.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I agree. I enjoy just simply gazing at
it.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm... I can sense just how hard <MYNAME>
has worked to make this garden. All I
can say is "good job."
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>The placements must have been difficult
to decide, but the outcome still came
out wonderfully. You have my respect.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This garden is rather ordinary. But
it has some qualities I'm quite fond of.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Well, I suppose it isn't bad... But 
with everyone gathered around I was 
expecting something more.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What a boring garden. It seems I have
wasted my time here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>I had hoped you would make a more
entertaining garden, but you have 
instead disappointed me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow<RED>∀</RED> What a pretty garden!
<PAGE>
If the entire town was like this garden,
it would be like we were living in a
theme park!
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Yeah... It's pretty... I want to live in
a town like this...

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a wonderful garden.... I could stay
here forever.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I didn't think I would ever see a
garden this beautiful!<RED>∀</RED> I'm so glad
I came today!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Amazing! You don't see a garden this
spectacular every day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Yeah... I'm having a good time just
gazing at it. I should thank
<MYNAME> later.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice garden. It must have taken
a long time to make.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You're right. I think a lot of effort
was put into it and it shows.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, it's not bad, but it's kind of
ordinary. I wanted something a little
more exciting.
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Yeah. I hope <MYNAME>
tries a little harder next time...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
As an entertainer, I can't say anything
good about your garden. You have to be
more considerate to your audience.
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. You should always give it your all
when trying to make other people happy.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! What an impressive Eastern-themed
garden! It's moving!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I love it! I can feel the cultural
significance flowing from the garden!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Amazing! I didn't think <MYNAME> had the
heart to make a garden like this!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Bravo! I'm impressed through and
through! <MYNAME> is amazing!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wonderful! You do great work, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I would love to have a garden like this
for my store!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Sounds good! I'd love to make a garden
like this someday! I oughtta get <MYNAME>
to teach me a thing or two!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
A delightful garden indeed! <MYNAME>
has done a great job!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What a nice garden! I could stay here
all day! How fun!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A standard garden. I would compare it to
your standard fare at an ordinary
restaurant.
<PAGE>
It's not bad, but I wish I could have
seen a garden more like a full course
meal!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>You're absolutely right! I was hoping to
see a more impressive garden on a bigger
scale!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This garden is just... It's all wrong!
You're not going to win over any fans
this way! You need to try much harder!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>You're right! You think I'd be
satisfied with a garden like this? What
do you take me for!?

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see this garden incorporates fall
plants.
<PAGE>
As someone born in the fall, I must say
I think it's wonderful! I'm very
impressed!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Ahehehehe! I was born in fall, too!
<PAGE>
Was this garden made just for us?!
Not bad! Good job! Ahehehehe!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ahehehe! Good! Good! I'm glad I came
even though it's so bright out.
<PAGE>
It's rare for me to look at anything
other than my research for this long!
You're in luck!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I understand why you would say that,
Sandra.
<PAGE>
This garden would be the perfect setting
for a novel. Maybe I should use it for
my book... I should ask <MYNAME> later.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wonderful. Well done, <MYNAME>. This
garden is fabulous.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Ahehehehe! This garden is perfect for me
to come take a break from my research!
<PAGE>
I should create a miniature version of
this garden for my room. Ahehehehe!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My my, this garden seems very relaxing.
Maybe I should go in and have a look.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>I know how you feel, Sandra, but you
shouldn't. Dunhill will get mad at you.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is so much more ordinary than I
expected. But I guess it's not awful...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>I just don't have time for ordinary
things. I'd rather those youngsters
focus on flashier gardens.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well... No comment on this garden.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>What is this?! I came here to see a
garden and this is what I get!? Are you
trying to insult me?!
<PAGE>
I'd rather go back to my research than
waste my time with this!

Oh, a country-style garden. It's like
being on the set of a movie. It makes 
me want to grab a guitar and sing.

Wow, what a surprise. I didn't think
there'd be a garden so splendid. I'm at
a loss for words.
<PAGE>
This was absolutely worth coming all
this way. Maybe I should bring my girl
next time.

You're already amazing for being a
rancher, but to be able to create a
garden like this, too? Can you teach me?

What a wonderful garden. Definitely a
worthwhile sight.
<PAGE>
I've been a part of many tours, but
this one was a hit!

Even I could make a garden like this.
<PAGE>
If something like this can make money,
I ought to grow my own garden...

Did I really spend five hours getting
here just to see a garden like this? I
should have slept in today.

Gardens with Eastern motifs are always
so relaxing.
<PAGE>
If I had a garden like this nearby, I'd
visit every day. I'm so jealous!

They say truly wonderful things can
change a person's life. I really think
this is one of them.
<PAGE>
I had no interest in creating a garden
before, but I think I'll really focus
on that now.

I only stopped by on my vacation, but
now I feel like this garden is the
highlight of my trip..
<PAGE>
If I have another chance, I'll
definitely come again.

You made such a wonderful garden all
on your own.
<PAGE>
If I weren't a woman, I'd ask <MYNAME>
for her hand in marriage.

What an ordinary garden. You had better
put some effort in, or no one will visit
again.

This garden is terrible. It doesn't
interest me in the least.

You've used many plants from the spring
season. The colors are beautiful and
the combinations are graceful.
<PAGE>
I think today's going to be a wonderful
day. I'm so glad I came.

I wasn't sure about the statement you
are trying to make with your garden, but
I'm honestly impressed.
<PAGE>
People really do become speechless when
they experience something truly
beautiful.

What a great garden. A garden like this
is bound to bring more tourists here.

You made this garden by yourself? I'm
honestly impressed.

It's ordinary... I didn't have any high
hopes to begin with, but this sure was
a disappointment.

You wanted us to pay to see this? I
feel insulted, to be honest.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look! There are so many animals! It's
like a zoo!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>You're right! They're adorable! If
there were a garden like this in town,
it would be so much fun!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, what a great garden! You made
something this awesome?! <MYNAME>,
you're a genius!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Haha. Oh, Tina. You look like you're
having fun!
<PAGE>
Then again, I am, too! There's just so
many things to look at and enjoy!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! This is such a nice garden, Tina!
Let's take a picture together later!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>That's a great idea! I think I should
write an article about this garden, too!
<PAGE>
Maybe we can create a photo collection
entitled "Gardening Tour Top 100 Picks"
with you as the editor!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I find it surprising that <MYNAME>
did all this alone.
<PAGE>
If I could make a garden this nice, I'd
become a gardener myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm so jealous of people that have so
many different talents. I'd be happy if
I could do half as much!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This garden isn't bad at all. I like
this kind of thing quite a bit.
<PAGE>
Gardens that let you relax can't be too
busy, but they can't be too barren
either.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>You're right. That makes a lot of sense,
Tina. I'm a fan of gardens like this
too.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Even I can't rile myself up over a
garden like this. Oh, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Right. I was looking forward to today's
tour, but it's very unfortunate.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This garden has many winter plants.
Well done. I was born in winter, so I
enjoy it all the more. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I like this garden, too. I'm not
really interested in gardening, but I
could stay here forever.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's only one word to describe this:
Splendid. Every single thing in the
garden looks full of energy.
<PAGE>
As I gaze at it, I completely lose track
of time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>You're right. I could stay here all
day and never be bored. Every glance
brings a new discovery.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, I didn't think <MYNAME> could make a
garden this nice.
<PAGE>
Now our city will be bustling with
people soon!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I was thinking the same thing. What an
exciting garden! It's had quite an 
impression on me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't really care about what makes it
a good garden, but I can tell a lot of
effort was put in it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I agree. I can sense the passion of the
maker just by looking at it. It's a
good garden, indeed.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This garden doesn't particularly attract
other people, but I like it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I'd rather see something more amazing,
since we came all this way, but I guess
there's nothing wrong with this one.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't know what to say...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>I don't know a lot about gardens, but
this one is just a bit too...lacking,
maybe? It really needs something more.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, this garden is pretty unique. It's
full of little details everywhere. I
like it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Agreed. Going the traditional route can
be good, but it's fun to see gardens
like this that are a little different.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a great garden! I still can't
believe a single person did all this!
I'm glad I've had the chance to see it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Splendid... Camellia and I love gardens,
but this one is something special.
<PAGE>
I envy <MYNAME> for being able to create
a garden of this caliber.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a wonderful garden. I wish I could
be enjoying it with the Goddess and not
here with you, Soseki.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Right back at you, buddy. Anyway, this
garden really is something else. I wish
I could live here.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I really like this garden. It sure has
a great atmosphere. I couldn't help but
drop by to look.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>It's not bad. If I could see a garden
of this caliber every time, I'd 
wouldn't mind coming here more often.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a very average garden, but being an
adult means finding things to enjoy
in that. 
<PAGE>
Soseki, look. Don't you think that area
over there is particularly nice?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh, that? It's nice, but I prefer
this section over here.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I had high hopes for this tour. What
happened? It's just disappointing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Hmmm... I was looking forward to it,
too. Let's just hope the next one is
better.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm an old woman, so these country-style
gardens are really appealing to me.
<PAGE>
I'd want to make a garden like this
myself. I should go ask <MYNAME> the
trick to doing it later.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I want to listen in on that, too.
Gardens like this are hard to make, even
if you know how.
<PAGE>
I really like this garden. I just feel
so at ease here.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, my! What a wonderful garden!
<PAGE>
I'm so glad I could live long enough to
see something like this in my lifetime.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh, Hana. Then again, you've got a
point. It's such a luxury to be able to
see a garden like this.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a wonderful garden. If only I had
a garden like this at home, I'd skip
with joy everywhere I go.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh, that sounds good. Maybe I should
skip along with you. Hahaha...

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is nice. I feel so happy being able
to look at a garden like this. <MYNAME>
must be such a hard worker.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>There's work at the ranch to be done and
yet <MYNAME> still had the time to make
this. I'm really impressed.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not too overdone, not too barren, this
garden manages a perfect, delicate
balance. It's just my type of garden.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Right. They say simple is best, and I
completely agree.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This garden was pitiful. It's
unfortunate because I was looking
forward to seeing it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Right... It needs to look more like a
garden or we'll start losing visitors.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wonderful! Summer plants everywhere!
<PAGE>
Camellia and I were both born in the
summer, so it's especially lovely to us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Honestly... The gracefulness of summer
plants just brings the garden to life.
